tool.name: Tribal_Consultation_Maps_Tables_by_County

param.name: eSTIP_tribal_consultation
param.displayname: eSTIP List for Tribal Consultation (Microsoft Excel File)
param.dialogReference:
Excel sheet containing eSTIP projects to be mapped. This file must have a sheet named 'eSTIP Filtered' and must have columns named 'Route', 'BOP', 'EOP', and 'Length (Miles)'. The tool creates a temporary Excel file, which is deleted at the end, to perform the following operations:

  1. Route values are altered so that they have the correct syntax for adding them to NMDOT's linear reference system (e.g. NM-4-P)

  2. Records where route is blank are omitted

  3. The 'Length (Miles)' column is renamed to 'Length'

param.name: output_location
param.dialogReference: This is the location where you want to save the output from this tool.

param.name: map_note
param.displayname: Map Note Text (placed at map bottom)
param.dialogReference: Enter the map note (if any) you want to be added at the bottom left hand corner of the map.

param.name: season
param.dialogReference: Choose the season to append to the map's title (year is added automatically using the current year).

tool.summary: This tool creates a county focused map of eSTIP projects for any county with eSTIP projects (it excludes counties with 0 projects). The tool adds eSTIP projects to NMDOT's LRS as either points or lines depending on project length (1000 ft is the demarcation). Projects are labeled by control number (CN attribue) and then all labels are converted to annotation so that annotation can be moved below the county mask prior to export as a PDF into a folder created at run time. The tool provides the user control of specifying output location for the maps, control of changing the map notes placed at the bottom of the map, & season text that is appended to the map title. The tool also exports a separate Excel file for each county containing projects occurring there.

Consts.useLimit: This tool requires Pandas 0.23, as well as xlsxwriter 1.0.5 to run.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool creates a county focused map of eSTIP projects for any county with eSTIP projects (it excludes counties with 0 projects). The tool adds eSTIP projects to NMDOT's LRS as either points or lines depending on project length (1000 ft is the demarcation). Projects are labeled by control number (CN attribue) and then all labels are converted to annotation so that annotation can be moved below the county mask prior to export as a PDF into a folder created at run time. The tool provides the user control of specifying output location for the maps, control of changing the map notes placed at the bottom of the map, & season text that is appended to the map title. The tool also exports a separate Excel file for each county containing projects occurring there.
